function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of unproven technology for virus and bacteria elimination on masks and air filtration systems","Impact":"Ineffective virus and bacteria elimination, leading to increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and validation of the technology before widespread implementation","Technologies":"Laser-induced graphene (LIG), self-sterilized technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Researchers, technology developers, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Reliance on carbon-based materials and composites for antiviral properties","Impact":"Ineffectiveness in disrupting virus transmission, leading to continued risk of infectious viruses","Mitigation":"Research and development of alternative antiviral coatings, validation of antiviral properties","Technologies":"Graphene oxide (GO), reduced graphene oxide (rGO), graphene-based nanocomposites (GBNs)","People":"General public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Requirement of laser treatment and sunlight exposure for reusable graphene-coated face masks","Impact":"Inconvenient and impractical usage for the general public, potentially leading to non-compliance","Mitigation":"Development of efficient and convenient reusability methods, education on proper mask maintenance","Technologies":"Laser-induced graphene (LIG), sunlight exposure techniques","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Technology developers, public health organizations"}]}
